resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105203</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105203</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206180</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Everglades Educational Resources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Everglades Pädagogische Betriebsmittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressources Éducatives d'Everglades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos Educacionais De Everglades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse Educative Di Everglades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπαιδευτικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς Everglades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos Educativos De Everglades</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides classroom activities, resources for teachers, a list of current articles, links to recommended readings, and field guides about Everglades National Park. It also tells how to plan class visits to the park.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Klassenzimmeraktivitäten, Betriebsmittel 
für Lehrer, eine Liste der aktuellen Artikel, Links zu empfohlenen 
Messwerten zur Verfügung und fängt Anleitungen über 
Everglades Nationalpark auf. Er erklärt auch, wie man Kategorie
Besuche zum Park plant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit des activités de salle de classe, des 
ressources pour des professeurs, une liste d'articles actuels, des 
liens aux lectures recommandées, et des guides de zone au sujet de 
parc national d'Everglades. Il indique également comment 
projeter des visites de classe au parc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece atividades da sala de aula, recursos para 
professores, uma lista de artigos atuais, as ligações às leituras 
recomendadas, e as guias do campo sobre o parque nacional de 
Everglades. Diz também como planear visitas da classe ao 
parque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce le attività dell'aula, le risorse per 
gli insegnanti, una lista degli articoli correnti, i collegamenti alle
letture suggerite e le guide del campo circa il parco nazionale di 
Everglades. Egualmente dice a come progettare le chiamate del 
codice categoria al parco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τις δραστηριότητες τάξεων, στοιχεία 
συμπεριφοράς για τους δασκάλους, ένας κατάλογος παρόντων άρθρων,
συνδέσεων με τις συνιστώμενες αναγνώσεις, και οδηγών πεδίων για 
το εθνικό πάρκο Everglades. Λέει επίσης πώς να 
προγραμματίσει τις επισκέψεις κλάσης στο πάρκο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a actividades de la sala de clase, a 
recursos para los profesores, a una lista de artículos actuales, a 
conexiones a las lecturas recomendadas, y a guías del campo sobre el 
parque nacional de Everglades. También dice cómo planear 
visitas de la clase al parque.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206180</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105203</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/everglades-educational-resources</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
